frame.name: Being_pregnant
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame describes the experience of expecting and bearing a child, from the perspective of the parent(s). </def-root>

FE.name: Mother
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element refers to the parent who is physically pregnant.</def-root>

FE.name: Father
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element refers to a parent who contributed to the conception of a child but is not physically carrying a child.</def-root>

FE.name: Parents
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element refers to the collective body expecting or carrying a child.</def-root>

FE.name: Offspring
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame refers to the conceived offspring borne by the <fen>Parents</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element refers to the length of time the <fen>Parents</fen> have been pregnant.</def-root>
